duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop SEO strategies and content programs to meet clients' business growth goals.
Conduct keyword research using SEO tools and analytics data to identify key search terms.
Optimize core page elements for target keywords to improve organic search rankings.
Perform technical site audits to identify errors and indexability issues.
Analyze competitor strategies and provide content opportunity assessments.
Prepare client-facing presentations, research, and execution documents.
Collaborate with client's technical and content teams to implement recommendations.
Assist in developing and tracking SEO initiatives and digital performance.
Provide hands-on training and guidance to SEO Associates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Advertising, Journalism, or Communications
